indications:
Indications 
(From 9.6.4 Vitamin D: British National Formulary)
9.6.4 Vitamin D
name: CALCITRIOL - VITAMIN D
cautions:
Cautions see under Ergocalciferol; monitor plasma calcium, phosphate, and creatinine
during dosage titration
doses:
By mouth, renal osteodystrophy, initially
250 nanograms daily, or on alternate days (in patients with normal
or only slightly reduced plasma-calcium concentration), increased
if necessary in steps of 250 nanograms at intervals of 2–4 weeks;
usual dose 0.5–1 microgram daily; child not established

Established postmenopausal osteoporosis, 250 nanograms twice
daily (monitor plasma-calcium concentration and creatinine, consult
product literature)
